solution: 998A - BalloonsIt is easy to show, that if at least one solution exists, than it is possible to use the answer, which contains only one, minimal, element.Suppose, that this set is not valid. Then one of the following holds:  Either n=1, and then there is no solution  Or n=2, and other element is equal to minimum, in this case it is ease to see that there are not solution too. Also, the limits were set in such way, that solution which bruteforces all 2n subsets and checks them also passes.Author â€” MikeMirzayanov
